name: Crypt Raider (Calae)
description:
Hello! My name is Calae and I am learning UE5. I am following a course on GameDev.tv, linked here. This is the third finished project out of 5.

In this game, you are raiding a crypt! There is a large golden statue deep inside the crypt. Can you bring the statue back out of the crypt?

Controls are as follows:

  • WASD: Move around
  • Space bar: Jump
  • Left click (hold): Grab and hold an object
  • Left click (release): Let go of the held object
  • R: Restart the game
  • Escape: Exit the game

Good luck raider!
